title: Bilzin Sumberg Corporate and Finance Leader Leaves for CEO Role with Firm Client | Daily Business Review - Law.com
content: Bilzin Sumberg Corporate and Finance Leader Leaves for CEO Role with Firm Client | Daily Business Review  Law.com
description: After 22 years at Bilzin Sumberg, Jay Sakalo is leaving to oversee Scott Holdings LLC, a family office with institutional and private equity investments previously run by Bilzin clients Steven Scott, M.D. and Rebecca Scott.
